TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContactManager extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class ContactManager Implements IDisposable
public ref class ContactManager sealed : IDisposable

summary.span: Represents a collection of objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.

span.span: Represents a collection of objects which persist in a Windows Address Book.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會有沒有公用建構函式，因為它的參考由類別。This class has no public constructors, since a reference to it is returned by the class. 位址相關聯的書籍管理包含這些主機的對等電腦與遠端對等相關聯。Address books that are associated with management include those associated with the host peer and a remote peer. 任何一部電腦可能會與其他對等節點; 共同作業遠端對等，但不是主機對等電腦的本機對等時，可以加入至主機對等。Either computer may collaborate with other peers; when a peer is local to the remote peer but not the host peer, it can be added to the of the host peer. 上的特定作業類別，例如和、 相關聯的作業正在執行 Windows 通訊錄的遠端對等關聯。Certain operations on the class, such as and , correlate to the associated operations being performed on the Windows Address book of the remote peer. 主機的對等電腦具有存取權的這個永續性儲存體可以與對等打算參與的應用程式相關聯的資訊。The host peer has access to this persistent storage for information, which can be associated with the applications in which a peer intends to participate. A識別自己的使用者身分的電腦上的持續性存放區。A can identify itself as a user of a persistent store on a computer. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何列舉並將其加入為本機:The following example code illustrates how to enumerate a and add it as a to the local : [!code-csharp[NCLPNRPContacts#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLPNRPContacts/CS/NCLPNRPContacts.cs#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為訂用帳戶每位使用者並不是依處理序或應用程式定義域，另一個主機上執行的應用程式也可能導致引發此事件。Since subscriptions are per user and not per process or per application domain, another application running on the host may also cause this event to be raised. 此事件需要的。This event requires a of .

summary.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

span.span: When this property value is set, all events not fired as the result of an asynchronous operation will have the associated event handlers called back on the thread that created the specific .

value.span: 物件，用於實作介面，並建立它的執行緒上的事件處理常式同步處理對這個型別的執行個體所使用。

span.span: Object that implements the interface and is used by instances of this type for event handler synchronization on the thread that created it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設設定值，這個屬性是`null`，表示所有事件處理常式會在系統執行緒集區執行緒上都呼叫。The default set value for this property is `null`, indicating that all event handlers are called on a system thread pool thread. 此屬性通常這類設定的 UI 項目執行個體。This property is typically set to a UI element such as a instance.
